Caption: Prof. B. Sengupto and Mr. R. Natarajan (foreground) standing at the microphones while the other dignitaries are seated at the dais
Description: On the dais sitting from left: Mr. M. C. Chagla, Dr. A. L. Mudaliar, Dignitary (yet to be identified), Dr. Y. Nayudamma, Prof. Venkat Rao, Prof. Klein, Prof. P. C. Varghese and Prof. Lutz. Natarajan would complete his term as Registrar in a few days.
